item.title: Unable to trade self
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Download cheat clients, and find out their UID. You’re smart, you can do it (if not, ask around)

The second part. It’s probably not written properly. Why is there a break; to my if statement? Just add it in your trading stuff.

whateverTheLineForTradeIsCaseMaybeIdunno [bracketColonWhoKnows] //what I said here else { //all your trading stuff //however it ends

[quote=“gon3d34d123, post:5, topic:287377”][quote author=silabgarza link=topic=380000.msg2856898#msg2856898 date=1246925350]
if(playerName == p2.playerName){
sM(“You’re not allow to trade, your cheater.”);
break;
}
[/quote]
would just disable trading?[/quote]
How? (that’s not what I originally posted)

Read full topic

where wuld i add that 2nd code, i never messed with trading on this source… only to fix dupes n stuff

sM(“You’re not allow to trade, your cheater.”);
break;

item.title: Unable to trade self
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

For seeing if it’s a cheat client, you of course have to check the UID.

public boolean isACheater() { if(UID == ###) return; return; }

Then within your trade,

if(isACheater() && playerName == p2.playerName) sM("You're not allow to trade, you're a cheater.");

Get my point?

Read full topic

item.description:

like…

if (playerName == c.tradeId.playerName) {
disconected = true;
}

idk if thats even the right code

but… im asking for the code + where to put it
